evidence.claim: Cancer Expert Now utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure to enhance service delivery.
The platform is designed to comply with HIPAA regulations for handling patient health information securely.
Utilization of HL7 standards for data exchange and FHIR for interoperability in healthcare solutions.
Their integration patterns include RESTful APIs for client interactions and data transactions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or clearinghouse use cases found on their site.
